Grow your business today. Namarunu store gets you a professional eCommerce platform with 24/7 expert support that is easy to set up, maintain, manage and grow.
Without writing a single line of code.

Set up and launch in less than 3 business days!


Create and launch a beautiful, fully functional e-commerce website with all necessary features in less than 3 business days! Our eCommerce software is robust, well-tested and includes bug fixes, feature updates and professional technical support 24/7 all within the advertised package price!


Adaptable to your idea!


Get a fully dynamic eCommerce website adaptable to any idea. Whether you are selling furniture or jewlery or even pets, We got you. Let your users see all the details about your product, order and even pay online. The system will even update your stock number to avoid selling out of stock items!

eCommerce website essentials

Namarunu-store makes sure your eCommerce website is smooth and enjoyable for both you and your customers.

Products & Listings +

Add your product name, description, price, images, stock no plus many more fields to ensure your customers see and are satisfied with all the information provided about your products

Order flow +

Namarunu store allows your users to view your listed products, add them to cart and order them online, choose a delivery method and even pay online so you can fulifill their purchases

User profiles +

N-store allows your customers create accounts to save their delivery addresses for easier ordering, they can also save their favourite products, change their passwords and information details.

Payment Getaways +

N-store is inbuilt to accept payments from your customers via Mpesa, Card transactions, bank transfers and more. Both you and your customer receive email notifications after a successful payment. You can choose to have either manual or automatic payment verifications

Delivery Estimates +

N-store uses distance matrixes by google with sendy app to give cost estimates for deliveries. You can choose whether to include this delivery cost estimate in your customers total cost, or just show it to them and have them pay for it themselves.

Multiple sign-up/sign-in options +

Let your users set up accounts quickly and securely. They can sign up with google or facebook or a custom sign up form to take in some more desired data.

Search engine and filtering +

A great search experience is a must for any eCommerce website. N-store advanced filtering and categorization tools means that users can easily find products based on keywords, price, category, sale and more.

Mobile friendly +

Your N-store eCommerce website is guaranteed to look, work and feel great on any device

Full control at every turn

See and control anything and everything that happens in your eCommerce website with our powerful admin tools.

Tracking & Managing +

N-store provides a robust admin panel where you can manage your entire store from. Add, edit, delete and update all your products, your orders and payments and all your users.

Dynamic customization +

N-store lets you customize your site to match your taste. Dynamically add your business logo, homepage image sliders and even choose some products to promote on your homepage. You can also dynamically add content for your about us page and contact us page

Spreading the word. Let it be known

See and control anything and everything that happens in your eCommerce website with our powerful admin tools.

SEO +

Your N-store eCommerce site is developed according to search engine optimization (SEO) best practices. Let our automatic common tags help you rank in search results or customize title and description tags freely.

Analytics & Marketing +

Integrate Google Analytics to your marketplace to understand your traffic channels. Encourage social sharing, send marketing email, or link your blog for content marketing.

Pricing based on your business size

create your eCommerce website. Then choose the best plan for your idea and budget – pricing only goes up when your business grows. No lock-in, no hidden fees, no credit card needed.

Are you a small business? Looking for even more affordable rates? Click Here to view our startup package

    About Namarunu-store pricing
  1. Namarunu doesn't take any fee from transactions. However, payment gateway fees from Mpesa or flutterwave may apply and are usually around 3%–4%
  2. Hosting, maintenance, backups, and updates are included in your plan. When new features are released, your eCommerce website is automatically updated.
  3. Prices do not include VAT.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will you be there to help? +


Yes! we will be with you every step of the way, professional support 24/7

How long will it take get my site up and running? +

Just as advertised, in 3 business days, you will be able to add your products, handle orders and deliveries and receive payments as well, straight from your laptop or mobile device.

What do you mean by technical support? +

If your site crashes or does not perfom as required, we will fix it for you at no extra cost. You will also enjoy constant updates of site features, secuirty patches or and any other fix that can only be handled by a professional

Will you add my products and manage my content? +

No. Our platform provides a robust admin management system where you can add all your products, put them in categories, manage your orders and payments and more. we do however, as a separate package offer website administration services where we can do all this plus more for you. Contact us for more information about this if interested

Do you provide a contract for your services? +

Yes. We provide contracts for the various services we provide when requested

Will you have access to my site? +

No. The site is yours, you will have full access to it with no limit or inteference from our end
